About Revolution Macro

Founded in 2018, Revolution Macro has been at the forefront of automation technology, helping businesses of all sizes transform their operations through intelligent workflow automation.

Our team of engineers and automation specialists have developed a proprietary macro engine that understands context, adapts to changing conditions, and continuously improves performance.

We believe that automation should be accessible to everyone, which is why we've designed our solutions to be intuitive while maintaining powerful capabilities for advanced users.
